treatment-md.title: Otobothrium carcharidis (Shipley & Hornell, 1906) Pinter 1913
treatment-md.article-title: Redescriptions of four species of Otobothrium Linton, 1890 (Cestoda: Trypanorhyncha), including new records from Australia, New Caledonia and Malaysia, with the description of O. parvum n. sp.
